page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content:
{ football, rugby, netball, and { baseball teams.
There are strong links with the community, with the school providing a meeting place for various clubs and organizations in the village.
There is a flourishing Parent/Teacher Association which has also had its work curtailed by the Teachers' Industrial Action. ************************************* There are also two{pre-school {playgroups}in the village, which seem to indicate the need for a state nursery school.The{head teacher}of Rhws School,{Mrs Davies,}has been strongly in favour of the establishment of such a nursery at her school.
